/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked neatly on the side of the road, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, providing a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. The sky above is a serene blue, dotted with a few clouds, completing the picturesque scene.
